description: Smaller events will be held in the Isle of Man's capital after fears of overcrowding were raised.
title: Douglas Christmas lights switch-on 'very different' for 2020
title_page: Douglas Christmas lights switch-on 'very different' for 2020 - BBC News
maintext: Mr Cheshire said although the "official launch of Christmas in Douglas will be very different this year", the changes would "deliver festive spirit in new and exciting ways the length and breadth of the town centre".
